amendment.description: Amendment allows otherwise eligible Nationally Significant Freight and Highway Projects, which do not meet the minimum $100 million threshold, to qualify for the specific reserved amount as provided in the legislation for such projects that fail to reach that threshold.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to allow otherwise eligible Nationally Significant Freight and Highway Projects, which do not meet the minimum $100 million threshold, to qualify for the specific reserved amount as provided in the legislation for such projects that fail to reach that threshold.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Costello (PA) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Costello (PA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Costello (PA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Costello (PA) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
